name: Emilia
description: Candidate for the 42nd King of Lugnica, Contractor of Puck the Great Elf.

passiveSkill.name: Lesser Spirit Blessing
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "After Emilia casts a Unique Skill, restores the total Unique Skill damage * {placeholder} HP to all allied partners.Lineup Skill:Have Ram or Rem in the lineup.Activation Effect: When Ram or Rem is present and Emilia is in the back row, grants Emilia Invincibility. The effect cannot be dispelled or stolen."}

uniqueSkill.name: Permafrost
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Emilia deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to all enemies, preventing all enemies from restoring Rage for {placeholder} secs."}

specialSkill.name: Ice Flower
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Emilia deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single target. Also increases own Heal Rate by {placeholder}. Lasts 2 rounds. Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Frost Flurry
normalSkill.description: Deals {placeholder} of ATK damage to an enemy.
